about_the_game:
LEGION is an epic real-time strategy game that brings the thrill of large-scale battles to both mobile devices and desktop platforms. Engage in intense, short skirmishes on diverse maps as you command massive armies, each consisting of hundreds of units.

Key Features

  • Cross-Platform Play: Experience seamless gameplay across mobile and desktop, allowing you to take the battle wherever you go.

  • Real-Time Strategy: Strategize in real time as you control every aspect of your squads on the battlefield.

  • Complete Squad Control: Take charge of your units with full precision—raise shields, adjust formations, and control formation density to outmaneuver your opponent.

  • Realistic Physics: Watch as cavalry charges tear through formations of archers, creating dynamic and believable battle scenes.

  • Variety of Maps: Fight across 3 unique battlefields, each offering different tactical challenges and opportunities.

  • Campaign Mode: Immerse yourself in a gripping campaign, honing your skills and learning the ropes before taking the fight online.

  • Online Multiplayer Battles: Test your strategic prowess against players worldwide in exciting real-time skirmishes.

  • Ranked Matches: Climb the ranks in competitive battles, proving your skills as a commander.

  • Unit Upgrades: Customize and improve your squads to create a fighting force tailored to your style of play.

Command, strategize, and dominate in LEGION—the ultimate RTS experience where every decision counts. Will your tactics bring victory, or will your army fall before a superior foe?
